title: Single Team User
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged in user with single team entitlements

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I select the game tile of a game in which my team is not involved.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I will be presented with lock icons in the game tiles
AND I will be presented with the Subscription required modal if I select one of these games

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I attempt to play a feed of a game my team is participating in, but to which I am not entitled (other team's feed)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the feed should display a lock icon
AND clicking it will have no effect

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I attempt to play a regional feed to which I am entitled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the stream will play successfully when selected

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I attempt to play a national feed to which I am entitled (my single team is participating in the game)

NOTE:Archived Mets at Nationals on April 8, 2022 is an example national feed (in this case Apple TV+ archived feed). Call letters in the center of the feed select modal are an indicator of national feed.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the stream will play successfully when selected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I attempt to play VOD/SVOD content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the stream will play successfully when selected

title: TV user
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with MLBALL entitlements
custom_steps: WHEN they attempt to stream media
custom_expected: THEN they will be allowed to stream VOD, archived games, and live games

title: free user
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user logged in no additional entitlements (free user)
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to access media
custom_expected:
THEN they will NOT be able to access most live and archived games or SVOD content
AND they will be able to access ADHOC, VOD, and Free Games of the day

title: Executive User
custom_preconds: Given a user logged in as an executive user
custom_steps: WHEN they attempt to play media
custom_expected: THEN they will be able to access VOD, live and archived games, and they will not be blacked out of any feeds
